# Draft:Pastor Kingsley Osei

----
Kingsley Boabeng Osei, known professionally as Pastor Kingsley B. Osei, is a Christian pastor, author, televangelist, and dynamic conference speaker. He is the Founder and Senior Pastor of Victory International Church and Faith International Church, a global ministry with a presence in multiple nations. He is also the founder of the media ministry Right Now Word International, which broadcasts his teachings through national, international television and various digital platforms. Renowned for his incredible depth of biblical knowledge, revelatory teaching, and powerful dynamic preaching, Pastor Osei is a leading voice with the Church, emphasizing the transforming power of the Gospel, Purpose, and Leadership.
Early Life and Education
While specific details of his early life are private, it is widely known that Pastor Kingsley Osei had a profound encounter with God at a young age, which ignited a lifelong passion for the Scriptures. He dedicated his formative years to an intensive and disciplined study of the Bible, developing the formidable exegetical foundation for which he is known today. His quest for theological knowledge led him to pursue formal ministerial education. His preaching often reflects a deep, Spirit-inspired insight that transcends academic learning.
Right Now Word International & Media Outreach
Recognizing the call to reach a global audience, Pastor Osei established Right Now Word International, his broadcast and media arm. This ministry produces and distributes his sermons through:
· National Television: Airing on major networks in Ghana and across Africa.
· Digital Platforms: Utilizing YouTube, social media, podcasts, and a dedicated ministry app to make his teachings accessible worldwide.
The name "Right Now Word" encapsulates his preaching philosophy—delivering a timely, relevant, and immediate word from God that meets the present needs of his listeners.
Preaching and Teaching Style
Pastor Kingsley B. Osei is widely celebrated for his unique and powerful oratory. His ministry is marked by:
· Incredible Biblical Depth: He is known for his masterful ability to intricately connect scriptures from the Old and New Testaments, revealing the consistent thread of God's redemptive plan. His sermons are rich with historical context, original language insights, and profound typology.
· Dynamic Prophetic Preaching: His delivery is passionate, authoritative, and charged with a prophetic urgency. He preaches with a compelling conviction that challenges complacency and inspires action.
· Revelatory Teaching: Beyond mere exposition, his teaching unlocks deep spiritual truths, providing practical wisdom for everyday living. Key themes in his messages include the triumph of holiness, understanding our identity in Christ, leadership, and finishing one's God-given race with strength.
Authorship
Pastor Osei is a prolific author, committed to putting his revelatory teachings into print for a wider audience. His books serve as enduring resources for spiritual growth and discipleship. His published works include:
· Live Now Forever: A profound exploration of eternal life as a present-tense reality for the believer, drawn from the finished work of Jesus Christ.
· The Triumph of Holiness: A powerful call to a life of sanctification and separation, demonstrating how holiness is not a burden but the key to triumph in the Christian walk.
· Finish the Race: A motivational and scriptural guide on perseverance, resilience, and maintaining faith to complete one's divine destiny.
· God’s Way of Leadership: A leadership manual grounded in biblical principles, aimed at equipping and empowering leaders in the church, marketplace, and home.
Personal Life
Pastor Kingsley Osei is married to Pastor (Mrs.) Rita Osei, who is an integral part of the ministry, serving as a co-pastor and a leader in her own right.
Legacy and Influence
Through his local church, international crusades, television broadcast, and authored works, Pastor Kingsley B. Osei has established himself as a significant and influential voice in 21st-century global Christianity. His ministry continues to impact millions by providing deep theological substance coupled with charismatic power, equipping believers to live a victorious and purposeful Christian life.
